closed_reason: Added epic ID with monospace/muted styling to dropdown options in tick-header.ts and tick-board.ts (mobile filter). Format: '<id> - <title>' with .epic-id CSS class. Increased select min-width to 220px and bumped service worker cache to v4.
description:
In the epic filter dropdown, show both the epic ID and title. Format the ID differently (e.g. monospace, muted color) to distinguish it from the title.

Current: 'Tickboard UI Bug Fixes'
Desired: 't4x - Tickboard UI Bug Fixes' or similar
title: Epic filter dropdown should show ID + title
